mapper.select: select drugname, doctorname, department, sum(t_prescriptiondrugs.number*t_prescription.zynum) as countnumber, t_prescriptiondrugs.unit as drugunit from t_prescriptiondrugs LEFT JOIN t_prescription ON t_prescriptiondrugs.prescriptionid = t_prescription.id WHERE t_prescription.state like '已领药' AND t_prescription.createdate BETWEEN #{startdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{enddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY drugname, doctorname ORDER BY drugname
